source.name: Information Bridge Widget
source.description: The widget provides a search box for the DOE Information Bridge, containing Department of Energy full-text technical reports in physics, chemistry, materials, biology, environmental cleanup, energy technologies and others.  Selected coverage of reports from DOE predecessor agencies (AEC, ERDA).
